title: 5v5s Ranked Team LF MID laner
body:
We have an almost full team, our midlaner recently dropped out or went busy so we're looking for someone with the following attributes.

* High Silver or Gold
* Has Discord (web browser VOIP)
* Available to play most nights* (ranked queue opens at 8 so we play then)
* Able to work with a team and improve (take criticism and not rage)
_*_

We would prefer control mages but if your exceptionally good at a certain champ we can work around it.
 *We play 5v5s when everyone is on, we dont expect anyone to be free every single night, so we work around everyone's schedules.

Add me in game. Thanks
